resources.string:
Ask yourself these questions:

Is there a more rational way of thinking?

Am I focusing on things that aren't relevant?

What are the disadvantages of thinking this way?

What would someone else think about?
Be careful of what you\'re thinking when you feel bad.
What is your negative or unrealistic thought?
Please enter the full thought to continue…

Stop and reflect on what you're thinking.

Is it really true?

Do you have experience to back it up?

Is this thought absolutely true in all situations and all the time?
What is an alternative and helpful way of thinking?
Please enter your new thought to continue…
Before you can review the thoughts, you must challenge at least one!

string-array.name: list_negative_thoughts
string-array.item: I am helpless.
I am unlovable.
I shouldn\'t need help.
I am inadequate.
I am bound to be rejected.
I should be perfect.
This anxiety will drive me insane.
The world is a dangerous place.
I\'m going to make a fool of myself.
I\'ll fail if I don\'t plan ahead.
People will judge me.
People are going to take advantage of me.
I\'m always going to be anxious/depressed.
My opinions are not important.
There\'s something wrong with me.
I\'m going to have a stroke/heart attack.
I can\'t cope.
I\'m worthless.
People are going to think that I\'m stupid.
I don\'t fit in.
I\'m so weak.
I can\'t do this.
I\'m a failure.
The world is full of bad people.
Everybody dislikes me.
I don\'t deserve to be happy.
I\'m going to be alone.
I\'m not good enough.
I\'m incompetent.
Nobody cares about me.

string-array.name: list_positive_thoughts
string-array.item: Some of the things I do make life better.
My parents care about me.
When my friends encounter problems, I\'d help them if they\'d ask.
I\'m just as good as most people.
If I give it a try, I can succeed.
Nobody in this world is perfect, I can give it my best.
I\'ve experienced anxiety before and dealt with it.
Good things happen when I get out and do things.
I might feel anxious, but I can still have a good time.
I don\'t have to figure everything out to do something productive.
People\'s opinions don\'t have to affect my behavior.
There are plenty of good people in the world.
I might feel bad now, but even when that\'s happened in the past it hasn\'t lasted forever.
Some people value my opinions.
I\'m a person with strengths and weaknesses, just like everyone else in the world.
I\'ve been in these situations before and made it through.
I can accomplish some things.
When I accomplish things I\'m worthwhile.
Even if people think negatively about me, that doesn\'t mean I can\'t have a good time.
I fit in to certain places.
I have some strengths.
I can\'t do all of this at once, but I can start on a small step.
I succeed at some things.
There are some bad people in the world, but also lots of good people.
My friend likes me.
Sometimes I feel happy and I deserve that.
There are people I\'m connected to.
There are plenty of things I\'m good at.
I can do some things well.
There are some people who care about me.
